title: Collaborative Learning Practice Program for Enhancing Pre-Service Teachersâ€™ Self-Efficacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory knowledge and teaching practicum experience
context.additional_context: Limited smartphone-centric technological environment, targeting office/administrative working professionals, structured around formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners improve their self-efficacy scores by 20% or more through 8 weeks of collaborative instructional research.
Learners develop three or more classroom problem-solving strategies through community of practice activities.
Learners create and implement lesson design plans reflecting peer feedback at least twice.
Learners document their professional development four or more times through reflective journaling.
